author: costin
msg: Better management of endpoints for a worker.

author: costin
msg: Create a shm slot for each workerEnv child.
There are still some tricky issues with the childId in apache2
( this is not relevant for single-process servers )

author: costin
msg: Use shm for the stat info, if possible.
This is still unstable/experimental - needs more testing

author: costin
msg: - add a reference to the slot used for endpoint stats
- add 2 more fields to each slot, to support multiple structs.
- add endpointMap to worker - it'll contain all existing endpoints
- customizable error code and message if no worker is found
